strEmail.title: Email
strEmail.descrption: E-mail address of the user that was used for site registration

strPassword_1.title: Password 1
strPassword_1.description: Password associated with this e-mail address

strFirstName.title: First name
strFirstName.descrption: The first name of the user

strLastName.title: Last name
strLastName.descrption: The last name of the user

strIndustry.title: Industry
strIndustry.descrption: The industry of the user (dropdown of industries below)

strZIP.title: Zip code
strZIP.descrption: The 5-7 digit ZIP code (minimum length of 5))

chkTerms.title: Check terms
chkTerms.descrption: If the user agreed to the terms of the site checkbox

device_id.title: Device id
device_id.descrption: If a device ID is passed, the registration page assumes a temporary member associated with that device id exists. The registration page updates that member's information, sets an email address. After completion, the member is no longer temporary and the member_id is preserved.

plan.title: Plan
plan.descrption: The plan type that the user selected

format.title: Format
format.descrption: ENUM(xml, json) Returns the new member id, authenticated session id and membership restrictions

business_member_type.title: Check terms
business_member_type.descrption: The plan type that the user selected
